title: A Very British Coup (with Mike Wood MP)
itunes:title: A Very British Coup (with Mike Wood MP)
description:
In a stunning turn of events, the government has failed to get Chris Grayling elected as chair of the all-important Intelligence and Security Committee.

Mike Wood, Conservative MP for Dudley South, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing that Julian Lewis should be allowed to stay in the role, but the Tories were right to expel him from the party.

Plus, No 10 is sitting on another report, this one into bullying allegations against Priti Patel. Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael joins to discuss.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In a stunning turn of events, the government has failed to get Chris Grayling elected as chair of the all-important Intelligence and Security Committee.

Mike Wood, Conservative MP for Dudley South, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing that Julian Lewis should be allowed to stay in the role, but the Tories were right to expel him from the party.

Plus, No 10 is sitting on another report, this one into bullying allegations against Priti Patel. Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael joins to discuss.
